name: gbr-management-system
description: A management system for Green Box Rentals.

scripts.test-all: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha server/**/*.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=server/tests/reports,reportFilename=alltests --timeout 5000
scripts.test-containers: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha server/**/containers.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=server/tests/reports,reportFilename=containers --timeout 5000
scripts.test-products: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha server/**/products.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=server/tests/reports,reportFilename=products --timeout 5000
scripts.test-users: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha server/**/users.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=server/tests/reports,reportFilename=users --timeout 5000
scripts.test-defaults: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha server/**/defaults.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=server/tests/reports,reportFilename=defaults --timeout 5000
scripts.test-events: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha server/**/events.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=server/tests/reports,reportFilename=events --timeout 5000
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" " npm run client"

author: Brian Peter & Taylor Hartley
